title: Yosemite National Park: Video Problems?
body: Help with Videos       In order to view video on these web pages, you need either Adobe Flash (version 8 or higher) or Apple Quicktime (version 7 or higher). If you play a video and only hear sound, it may be because you have an old version of Flash (upgrade now). If you click on a video link and the video doesn't play, you can also right-click on the link and choose "save target as" or "save link as" to save the file to your computer, then play it from Quicktime.  Please let us know if you have any other questions or problems.
